data.title: bd-2p7p: protocol output contract + freshness semantics
data.description: Validates ProtocolGuidance contract stability with golden schema tests and implements freshness semantics (valid_for_sec + revalidate_cmd) for stale guidance detection. Includes comprehensive test coverage: 8 golden schema tests ensuring backwards compatibility, race-window test for freshness logic, and updated renderers (text/json/pretty) to include snapshot_at + valid_for_sec + revalidate_cmd fields. Adds COMPATIBILITY.md documenting the additive-only evolution policy and client responsibilities.

data.reason: LGTM - output contract and freshness semantics approved
